content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 cup butter" )
( ing-1 "1 cup white sugar" )
( ing-2 "1 egg" )
( ing-3 "1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract" )
( ing-4 "2 1/2 cups sifted all-purpose flour" )
( ing-5 "1/2 teaspoon salt" )
( ing-6 "1 cup rolled oats" )
( ing-7 "1/4 teaspoon peppermint extract" )
( ing-8 "3 drops red food coloring" )
( ing-9 "2 tablespoons confectioners' sugar" )
( ing-10 "5 (1.5 ounce) bars milk chocolate candy" )

content.text: 0) In a medium bowl, cream together butter or margarine and white sugar until light and fluffy.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "cream"@21:26 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "butter"@36:42 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "margarine"@46:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "white sugar"@60:71 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-0-0 "until light and fluffy"@72:94 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a medium bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
	)
)

( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Blend in"@3:11 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "egg"@12:15 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "vanilla"@20:27 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Add to creamed mixture and mix well.
6) Add peppermint extract and a few drops of food color to half of dough.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "peppermint extract"@7:25 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "a few drops of food color"@30:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "half of dough"@59:72 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-8-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-8-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-8-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Roll out each half of dough to 1/8 inch thickness on surface sprinkled lightly with confectioners' sugar.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Roll out"@-1:-1 / AC
		:ppt ( "each half of dough"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:loc ( ing-9 "surface sprinkled lightly with confectioners' sugar"@-1:-1 / TOOL )
		:todo ( "1/8 inch thickness"@-1:-1 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 10) Cut out half of each color with the 2 1/2 inch heart shaped cookie cutter, and half with a 1 1/2 inch cookie cutter.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "Cut out"@4:11 / AC
		:instrument ( tool-10-0 "the 2 1/2 inch heart shaped cookie cutter"@36:77 / TOOL )
		:todo ( "half of each color"@12:30 / FOOD )
		:todo ( "half"@83:87 / FOOD )
		:instrument ( tool-10-1 "a 1 1/2 inch cookie cutter"@93:119 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 11) Place them on unprepared cookie sheets.
12) Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven.
content.eamr:
( inst-12 / R
	:inform ( ac-12-0 "Bake"@4:8 / AC
		:duration ( dur-12-0 "10 to 12 minutes"@13:29 / DUR )
		:heat ( tool-12-0 "the preheated oven"@33:51 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 13) Remove from oven and place 1 one square (1/8) of a chocolate bar onto the center of each large heart.
14) Place small heart on top and press lightly to secure.

content.eamr:
( inst-15 / R
	:inform ( ac-15-0 "Transfer"@4:12 / AC
		:gol ( tool-15-0 "rack"@16:20 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-15-0 "to cool"@21:28 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)
